nodes.documentation:
@title Peer to peer lending contract.
Inherits the Ownable and Destructible contracts.
nodes.name: PeerToPeerLending

attributes.documentation:
@title Peer to peer lending contract.
Inherits the Ownable and Destructible contracts.
attributes.name: PeerToPeerLending

applyForCredit(uint256,uint256,uint256,b.return: credit Return credit address. The function publishesh another contract which is the credit contract. The owner of the new contract is the present contract.

changeCreditState(address).details: Function to toggle active state of credit contract.

changeCreditState(address,uint8).details: Function to switch active state of a credit.

getCredits().details: Get the list with all credits.
getCredits().return: credits Returns list of credit addresses.

setFraudStatus(address).return: users[_borrower].fraudStatus Boolean of the new fraud status.

devdoc.title: Peer to peer lending contract. Inherits the Ownable and Destructible contracts.
